title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 18 June 2012 - XWiki
content:
12:52 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
12:52 <vmassol> xwiki.org is restarting once every 2-3 days nowadays it seems  
12:55 <CIA-35> Caleb James DeLisle stable-4.1.x \* rfa4b917 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/fa4b917d38355980882bdc8f865848e93ccdb935 / xwiki-enterprise-test/xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/src/test/it/org/xwiki/test/selenium/AdministrationTest.java : [misc] fixed test which was failing because the classname element couldn't be found. - http://git.io/yZgTrg  
12:56 <CIA-35> Caleb James DeLisle master \* rb557567 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/b557567c2776233ee12fac93bcbed9af5513ccf2 / xwiki-enterprise-test/xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/src/test/it/org/xwiki/test/selenium/AdministrationTest.java : [misc] fixed test which was failing because the classname element couldn't be found. - http://git.io/RpVUHg  
13:10 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
13:13 <jvdrean1> has quit  
13:17 <jvelociter> has quit  
13:18 <CIA-35> Vincent Massol master \* r10c9dab https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/10c9dab1cdfc790d0ccb2098618c421c0336f238 / pom.xml : XCOMMONS-192: Upgrade to Maven Release plugin 2.3.2 - http://git.io/WdIWxQ  
13:24 <@cjd> Anybody need to hold up the release?  
13:25 <@cjd> vmassol: tmortagne jvdrean Enygma` evalica sburjan AndreasJonsson ??  
13:25 <vmassol> cjd: nothing on my side. Do we have any known blockers?  
13:25 <+evalica> me and Enygma` don't know any blockers.  
13:26 <@cjd> The only one I know of, the oracle thing, sburjan verified was fixed  
13:26 <+jvdrean> cjd: nope  
13:26 <vmassol> jvdrean: I commented on a commit of yours yesterday  
13:26 <vmassol> about breaking api  
13:27 <vmassol> it was for 4.1 I think  
13:27 <@cjd> also http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise41 is in pretty rough shape, I can copy stuff over from the milestones and RC release notes but I can't do your features the justice that you can ;)  
13:27 <+tmortagne> cjd: nothing from me  
13:28 <+tmortagne> there is the setFilename but it's not that it was a new thing  
13:30 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
13:31 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
13:32 <+tmortagne> s/that/like/  
13:43 <+tmortagne> sburjan: ok cool  
13:44 <CIA-35> Caleb James DeLisle master \* rf63134a https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/f63134a6daa27663705ea741541a27577845a344 / (3 files in 2 dirs): [release] Updated Translations - http://git.io/WhCIzw  
13:45 <+tmortagne> cjd: did  you check if da language is listed in WYSIWYG conf files ?  
13:46 <+tmortagne> talking about what mflorea indicated on http://l10n.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Wysiwyg/WebHome  
13:46 <vmassol> tmortagne: something strange on e.x.o  
13:46 <@cjd> I've not checked  
13:46 <vmassol> tmortagne: when I try to install http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Admin+Tools+Application from the EM UI  
13:46 <vmassol> I get: "We couldn't find any extension with id 'org.xwiki.contrib:xwiki-application-admintools' and version '3.0'."  
13:46 <vmassol> I've just searched for the extension and clicked "install"  
13:47 <+tmortagne> vmassol: sounds like a bug, what version of XE is that ?  
13:47 <vmassol> any idea?  
13:47 <vmassol> I'm on 4.2SNAP  
13:47 <vmassol> ludovic also tried on some older version  
13:47 <vmassol> it seems to be an e.x.o issue  
13:47 <CIA-35> Caleb James DeLisle stable-4.1.x \* r3afdabc https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/3afdabc62262add359fe379f30c9200464ca6c98 / (3 files in 2 dirs): [release] Updated Translations - http://git.io/AZgr5A  
13:47 <vmassol> is there a cache?  
13:48 <+tmortagne> no cache no  
13:48 <+tmortagne> checking what I get from REST  
13:48 <+tmortagne> ha we still have the internal error with browser, we need to upgrade xwiki.org  
13:49 <CIA-35> Caleb James DeLisle master \* r30a86ca https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-manager/commit/30a86cab261a0a43b0c2e77edfd15286f0ae6008 / xwiki-manager-ui/src/main/resources/XemResources/Translations.da.xml : [release] Updated Translations - http://git.io/33mrfA  
13:49 <vmassol> ah yes talking about upgrades we need to upgrade myxwiki.org too  
13:50 <+tmortagne> anyway checking what's wrong, probably not much  
13:50 <vmassol> I'll wait till cjd releases 4.1 final to upgrade myxwiki.org  
13:50 <CIA-35> Caleb James DeLisle stable-4.1.x \* rf13633b https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-manager/commit/f13633b7b6a7b1a967f21a6d8ddb3ded0db4f3c5 / xwiki-manager-ui/src/main/resources/XemResources/Translations.da.xml : [release] Updated Translations - http://git.io/SyC2Vg  
13:50 <+tmortagne> cjd: as far as I can see WYSIWYG translation files are not up to date  
13:50 <+tmortagne> I mean the translation setup files  
13:51 <@cjd> taking a look  
13:51 <+tmortagne> vmassol: we don't display the version of XE in the footer on xwiki.org  anymore ?  
13:52 <vmassol> tmortagne: don't know, maybe evalica removed it?  
13:52 <vmassol> I liked having it  
13:52 <+tmortagne> I can't find it  
13:52 <vmassol> although it doesn't matter much  
13:52 <+tmortagne> sure but it's useful information  
13:52 <+evalica> I removed it …  
13:52 <+evalica> can be added again  
13:53 <vmassol> normally we can have it with http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/rest/  
13:53 <+tmortagne> yes if course but still  
13:53 <+evalica> I'll put it back - since I miss it myself :)  
13:53 <vmassol> except now… so youl''need to run $xwiki.version ….  
13:53 <vmassol> ok cool  
13:53 <+tmortagne> it's a bit of a pain right now since we can't use REST with plain browser  
13:55 <CIA-35> Caleb James DeLisle stable-4.1.x \* re19bfb2 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/e19bfb2e2506ec67e12b7aa3d691a24aab101565 / (2 files in 2 dirs): [misc] Added Danish translation to WYSIWYG configuration files. - http://git.io/BJOR1Q  
13:55 <CIA-35> Caleb James DeLisle master \* r344e0b4 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/344e0b4814e2b5e4a7171cbffd6bf5310752347d / (2 files in 2 dirs): [misc] Added Danish translation to WYSIWYG configuration files. - http://git.io/DIsMnw  
13:58 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
14:16 <@cjd> tmortagne: should I expect changes to the translation .xar files after pressing the reload button?  
14:17 <+tmortagne> what do you mean by reload button ?  
14:17 <@cjd> http://l10n.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Wysiwyg/WebHome  
14:17 <@cjd> the one that's here  
14:18 <@cjd> It seems to want me to commit the changes and press the button  
14:19 <+tmortagne> actually I have no idea what mflorea expected it to do, I don't see what that would change since you already have the translation  
14:20 <+tmortagne> Ha no I kno  
14:20 <+tmortagne> it's not the same thing  
14:20 <+tmortagne> this link is part of the standard application sheet  
14:20 <+tmortagne> that's the link to reload all default translations  
14:20 <+mflorea> yes  
14:20 <+tmortagne> and mflorea you added the text above  
14:20 <+mflorea> it's not custom  
14:21 <+tmortagne> cjd: so don't worry about it, will add a heading or something to separate them  
14:21 <@cjd> ok cool  
14:22 <+tmortagne> need to upgrade l10n and use new sheet system  
14:22 <+tmortagne> it's a bit of a mess here with page name as title and them the actual titel as first heading  
14:33 <@cjd> tmortagne: there are a few issues of yours without documentation, can you have a look?  
14:33 <@cjd> http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/IssueNavigator!executeAdvanced.jspa?jqlQuery=Project+in+%28%22XWiki+Commons%22%2C+%22XWiki+Rendering%22%2C+%22XWiki+Platform%22%2C+%22XWiki+Enterprise%22%2C+%22XWiki+Enterprise+Manager%22%29+and+fixVersion+in+%28%224.1%22%29+and+resolution+in+%28%22Fixed%22%29+and+%28%28Documentation+is+EMPTY%29+or+%28%22Documentation+in+Release+Notes%22+is+EMPTY%29%29&runQuery=true&clear=true  
14:36 <@cjd> I'm going to call http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XE-1187 an N/A since lucaa isn't here to look at it.  
15:11 <+evalica> tmortagne , vmassol:  can you tell me please where i can find the 4.1 roadmap?  
15:11 <+evalica> sorry the 4.0 http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Roadmap?viewer=changes&rev1=110.6&rev2=111.1  
15:11 <vmassol> http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Roadmap  
15:11 <vmassol> same  
15:12 <+evalica> cause it seams it has been deleted  
15:12 <vmassol> indeed… hmmmm  
15:13 <vmassol> cjd: any idea?  
15:15 <jvdrean> has quit  
15:15 <+evalica> Thomas did the modification according to the history link I gave  
15:16 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
15:21 <@cjd> that's odd  
15:21 <@cjd> (odd if a page starts showing up as deleted for no reason)  
15:38 <jvelociter> has quit  
15:52 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
15:54 <tbishop> has joined #xwiki  
16:06 <@cjd> tmortagne: could you take a look at the issues which don't have documentation? they're probably N/A but since you fixed them, you should decide  
16:06 <@cjd> here's the list  
16:06 <@cjd> http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/IssueNavigator!executeAdvanced.jspa?jqlQuery=Project+in+%28%22XWiki+Commons%22%2C+%22XWiki+Rendering%22%2C+%22XWiki+Platform%22%2C+%22XWiki+Enterprise%22%2C+%22XWiki+Enterprise+Manager%22%29+and+fixVersion+in+%28%224.1%22%29+and+resolution+in+%28%22Fixed%22%29+and+%28%28Documentation+is+EMPTY%29+or+%28%22Documentation+in+Release+Notes%22+is+EMPTY%29%29&runQuery=true&clear=true  
16:07 <+tmortagne> cjd: sure  
16:08 <@cjd> thanks  
16:08 <+tmortagne> the link does not seems to work  
16:08 <+tmortagne> probably too long for irc  
16:08 <@cjd> http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/ReleasePlans  
16:08 <@cjd> it's there  
16:08 <@cjd> Closed issues without documentation  
16:09 <+tmortagne> it's probably all issues that don't need documentation, always forget to put N/A  
16:09 <+tmortagne> actually the link works well it was forbiddden by noscript  
16:12 <+tmortagne> cjd: done  
16:12 <@cjd> thanks  
16:16 <@cjd> does anyone know how to add a caption to the image macro?  
16:16 <@cjd> {{image reference=....  caption="this is a caption" /}} ??  
16:18 <vmassol> main wiki  
16:18 <vmassol> Macros.ImageMacro I think  
16:18 <vmassol> http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/ImageMacro  
16:18 <vmassol> you need PR on the farm  
16:19 <@cjd> thanks  
16:27 <+jvdrean> cjd: did you start the release process ?  
16:27 <@cjd> yes  
16:27 <@cjd> can you take a look at http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise41 ?  
16:28 <@cjd> I kind of hacked it together  
16:28 <@cjd> from the milestones  
16:28 <@cjd> want to make sure everyone's features are well represented  
16:28 <+jvdrean> I mean the maven release  
16:29 <+jvdrean> Sorin has spotted an issue I'd like to fix  
16:29 <@cjd> yes, it's actually all done and in staging  
16:29 <+jvdrean> it's not a blocker but it's not nice  
16:29 <+jvdrean> oh  
16:31 <tbishop> has quit  
16:35 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
16:47 <@cjd> sburjan: if you want to get a jump on the testing, here's the zip file  
16:47 <@cjd> http://nexus.xwiki.org/nexus/service/local/repositories/xwiki\_releases\_staging-003/content/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb/4.1/xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb-4.1.zip  
16:47 <+sburjan> ok, so the artefact is here.. just wanted to report a suggestion  
16:47 <+sburjan> :)  
16:47 <@cjd> I can get you the other links if you want them  
16:47 <+sburjan> I guess it will be fixed in 4.2  
16:47 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* rce87efd https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/ce87efde220fc282bea2b2b7171dab2815065c86 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-repositories/xwiki-platform-extension-repository-xwiki/xwiki-platform-extension-repository-xwiki-server-ui/src/main/resources/ExtensionCode/ExtensionSheet.xml : [misc] Minor improvements - http://git.io/lPUzCA  
16:48 <@cjd> If there's something really bad it's still possible to reverse the release and do it again but that will make us late for sure.  
16:48 <tmortagne> has quit  
16:52 <+sburjan> so should I take 2 days to test it as I did until friday ?  
16:53 <@cjd> today is the official release day, as per the agreement on the list, we will only test post-release  
16:53 <@cjd> so this is just early post-release testing  
16:53 <+sburjan> 1) seems that the link you gave me to the .zip file is not forking for me  
16:54 <+sburjan> 2) AFAIK we agreed on other strategy, we post release milestones, and pre-release finals  
16:54 <+sburjan> I didn't see any final conclusion on that thread  
16:57 <@cjd> Today is the official release day according to the road map and I'd like to keep to it.  
16:57 <@cjd> If you have any questions about how it should work, ask vmassol since he's defining the strategy.  
17:00 <+sburjan> ok, so FTM we do post release for 4.1  
17:01 <+sburjan> still unable to access the link  
17:02 <+sburjan> so I can downlaod  
17:07 <@cjd> I can download it in the browser but I can't with wget  
17:07 <@cjd> debugging...  
17:12 <@cjd> seems to work now, give it a try  
17:13 <+sburjan> works, thanks  
17:14 <+sburjan> it is odd, because I don't see it on maven.xwiki.org ... isn't the same repo nexus is using also ?  
17:15 <@cjd> no, nexus does 2 things, it caches stuff that's in maven.xwiki and it stages stuff which will be pushed to maven when I push the button  
17:30 <+sburjan> ok, I see. so someone doesn't accidentally download 4.1 while it is in staging  
17:31 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
17:32 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
17:34 <+sburjan> see you tomorrow guys  
17:36 <sburjan> has quit  
17:47 <Enygma`> has quit  
17:48 <evalica> has quit  
17:56 <rrodriguez> has quit  
18:12 <ssavi> has joined #xwiki  
18:18 <+sburjan`> cjd: the JQL for "See the full list of JIRA issues fixed in this release." is wrong.. it only has M1  
18:19 <@cjd> thankyou  
18:19 <@cjd> fixing  
18:24 <+sburjan`> cjd: FYI I already tested the release post RC1, so it has been already tested pre-release  
18:25 <@cjd> Yeah, that makes it much less of a concern that it's not all tested pre-final  
18:26 <+sburjan`> I always hate this period, because these periods, because we launch 2 version in the same week. 4.1 and 4.0.1  
18:26 <+sburjan`> I always hate final release periods, because there are 2 releaes  
18:26 <@cjd> yeah  
18:26 <@cjd> tmortagne: "New API for upgrading installed XWiki Extensions." can you elaborate?  
18:27 <mflorea> has quit  
18:28 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
18:36 <+tmortagne> cjd: not sure it really worth mentioning in the RN it since it's not used by the UI yet (I did not added it)  
18:37 <+tmortagne> (to the release note)  
18:37 <@cjd> IMO we should explain the API since API is one of our strong points  
18:38 <@cjd> whereas The Other Guys™ are all flash and graphics, XWiki caters to developers  
18:39 <+tmortagne> cjd: yes but this one is really a UI oriented API that we did not had the time to use yet, upgrading an extension is possible since a long time  
18:41 <@cjd> ok, I'll remove it from the RN  
18:46 <lucaa> has quit  
18:48 <jvdrean> has quit  
19:11 <jamie\_\_wiki> has joined #xwiki  
19:14 <jamie\_\_wiki> mflorea:  I fixed the request parameter not being properly escaped on my pull request 53.. I also added in an extra check to ensure its a valid property being requested for the sort.  Should I re-open that pull request and add the changes? It's closed right now.  
19:14 <tmortagne> has quit  
19:15 <+mflorea> jamie\_\_wiki: I'm not sure.. sdumitriu WDYT?  
19:16 <jamie\_\_wiki> I'm new to github, so not sure what the best way to go about it.  I guess it's a fix (the escaping) with some extra verification added in.  
19:18 <+mflorea> I think you can make a new pull request with this fix. I don't know if we have a procedure regarding how pull requests are handled.  
19:19 <+mflorea> I mean, a new pull request with the fix and the extra verification  
19:19 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
19:22 <jamie\_\_wiki> ok here it is: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/pull/54  
19:23 <@sdumitriu> jamie\_\_wiki: Don't reopen, make a new pull request  
19:25 <jamie\_\_wiki> sdumitriu: I just created pull #54.. the previous closed one was 53.  I just added a comment in #53 about the fixes in the new pull request.
